oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ʻIqd al-marjān fī-mā yataʻallaqu bi-al-jānn : manuscript, [ca. 1725]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nūr al-Dīn al-Ḥalabī, ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm , 1567 or 1568-1635
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الحمد لمن له الفضل والمنة بايجاد الانس والجنة ... :Incipit
Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black with portions underlined in red. Comments in the margins.
Light brownish laid paper with watermarks. 21.8 x 15.9 cm. (17-18 x 11.5-12.5 cm.)
With: Sharḥ al-Nukhbah fī uṣūl ʻilm al-ḥadīth / Ibn Ḥajar (ff. 1r-42v) -- Ishārāt al-marām min ʻibārāt al-Imām / Beyazîzade (f. 47v-305v).
MS Arab SM334. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jinn
Islam--Essence, genius, nature
